tokens.text: identifies content items that are not referenced

title: Unlinked Items
description: Identifies content items that are defined but not referenced anywhere in the project. Also detects dependencies on vanilla Minecraft content that may change.

fields.title: Unused Item
fields.description: Warning when a defined resource (entity, block, item, etc.) is not referenced by any other content. The item may be unused or the reference may be missing.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the identifier of the unused item

fields.title: Vanilla Reference
fields.description: Recommendation to avoid direct references to vanilla Minecraft items. Vanilla content may change between game versions, potentially breaking your add-on.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the vanilla item identifier being referenced
